pullRequest.title: Add Synchronous APIs to ObjectSerializer and JsonSerializer
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR adds synchronous APIs to the ObjectSerializer and JsonSerializer interfaces. In addition APIs that return OutputStream were changed to return an extension of OutputStream based on the type of OutputStream passed into the API.
Asynchronous APIs will wrap the synchronous APIs as serialization and deserialization code works in a synchronous manner. This change was done as adding synchronous on top of asynchronous in the future could lead to Reactor throwing exceptions for blocking in a reactive thread.

commit.message: Add synchronous APIs to ObjectSerializer and JsonSerializer
Update synchronous APIs to take TypeReference

nodes.bodyText: Probably should inverse the naming for sync and async the way we do for clients. deserialize and deserializerAsync.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -12,6 +12,17 @@
  * Generic interface covering basic JSON serialization and deserialization methods.
  */
 public interface JsonSerializer extends ObjectSerializer {
+    /**
+     * Reads a JSON stream into its object representation.
+     *
+     * @param stream JSON stream.
+     * @param typeReference {@link TypeReference} representing the object.
+     * @param <T> Type of the object.
+     * @return The object represented by the deserialized JSON stream.
+     */
+    @Override
+    <T> T deserializeSync(InputStream stream, TypeReference<T> typeReference);

commit.message: Rename asynchronous methods to use suffix 'Async', dropped 'Sync' suffix from synchronous methods
